known_issues: Audio toggle buttons do not fully mute sound when set to Off; expected complete silence when toggled off.

existing_features.title: Ensure the Background Music mute toggle fully stops any currently playing background music when switched to Off (including Android WebView bridge mode and the web fallback).

Make the global mute state changes take effect immediately and reliably by updating the audio service so that setting background-music mute to true triggers the stop behavior without relying on a subsequent start call.
Ensure the Sound Effects (SFX) mute toggle fully mutes SFX by preventing any new sound effects from playing while Off across the app.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add two separate audio toggle buttons: one for background audio and one for other in-app sounds
